agency_name: Department for the Deaf and Hard-Of-Hearing
series_description: Documents the receipt of requests for the services of an interpreter and the Department's responses.
retention_statement: Retain 1 year, then transfer to the State Records Center,Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 2 years, thendestroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.Total retention 3 years.

agency_name: Department for the Deaf and Hard-Of-Hearing
series_description: Documents the receipt of and responses to requests for assistive technology (text telephones, amplified telephones and ring signalers). Includes data required to calculate sliding fees based on \applicant income.
retention_statement: Retain 4 years, then transfer to the State Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 1 year, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 5 years.

agency_name: Department for the Deaf and Hard-Of-Hearing
series_description: Documents the screening of candidates to serve as interpreters for the deaf and hard of hearing. Candidates are rated by the levels of their abilities.
retention_statement: Retain 18 months, then transfer to the State Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 30 months, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 4 years.
